name: G-Mode Archives 35: Magical Fantasista II
summary:
Lost and in search of "Akashic Records" ...
The second magic synthetic RPG that fights by making use of magic and individuality!

The second installment of the magical synthetic RPG "Magical Fantasista" series.
The three honor students of the Imperial Academy of Magic, Kamui, Mercurius, and Yuturna, were involved in a big incident during the final assignment at the end of the school year and decided to go on an adventure to solve it.

The three of them are good at attribute magic, sword magic, and star magic, each of which has different characteristics, and while synthesizing the magic obtained as a trophy and taking an exam at the dojo, while raising the magic level, they face the crisis of the Nebula country. I'll go.

Dungeons where the terrain changes every time you enter, and the ability equipment system where you can enjoy a wide variety of training are also alive and well.

Enjoy the magnificent world of Magical Fantasista, where many powerful enemies are waiting!
